name: Chauffeur ! The Crazy French Paris Taxi Cabs Airport Travel - Free

description:
TRY OUR CHAUFFEUR ! THE CRAZY FRENCH PARIS TAXI CABS AIRPORT TRAVEL GAME

Paris is the capital and most popular city of the France. You are the fastest cab driver in the biggest city of the France. Your passengers know that when they have to reach to Airport on time, your cab is the best one. Drive your passenger to Airport on time while avoiding collision with other cars and taxi. Collect as many money as possible to unlock new taxis while avoiding crashing with other vehicles

Features:

- Unlock amazing new taxis
- Awesome background and effects
------------
How to play?

- Drive your taxi as fast as possible
- Avoid other vehicles and crashing
- Pick up money on your way to unlock new taxis

DOWNLOAD TODAY FOR FREE >>> CHAUFFEUR ! THE CRAZY FRENCH PARIS TAXI CABS AIRPORT TRAVEL GAME
